statespace

Class StateSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • statespace.StateSpace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<State>, java.util.Iterator<State>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompleteStateSpace, ReducedStateSpace

    public abstract class StateSpace
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<State>, java.util.Iterator<State>

      • getProbableTransitions

        public abstract ProbableTransitions getProbableTransitions(State s,
                                         Algorithms.action a)
        returns a structure that contains all possible states associated with the predator in state s, wanting to perform action a
        Parameters:
        s - state of the predator
        a - action that the predator might perform
        Returns:
        ProbableTransition a structure containing possible states and probabilities

      • produceStochasticTransition

        public State produceStochasticTransition(State s,
                                Algorithms.action a)
        Given a current state and an action hat has been chosen by the agent, produce a stochastically determined new state that belongs to the set of states that that action might lead to. In other words, this is the environment deciding the agent's next state.
